text: Thitarodes baimaensis is a species of moth.Nielsen E.S; Robinson G.S. & and Wagner D.L. 2000. Ghost-moths of the world: a global inventory and bibliography of the Exoporia (Mnesarchaeoidea and Hepialoidea) (Lepidoptera). Journal of Natural History 34, 823-878. It is from the family Hepialidae, the ghost moths. It was described by Liang in 1988. It lives near Yunnan, China. == References == == External websites == *Buffalo Museum of Science. Hepialidae genera Category:Moths
title: Thitarodes baimaensis
